code: import'./CardSection.css';import ItemCard from'../ItemCard/ItemCard';import React from'react';import{makeApiRequest,defaultClothingItems}from'../../utils/utils';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CardSection(){const[temp,setTemp]=React.useState(0);const[weather,setWeather]=React.useState('');React.useEffect(()=>{makeApiRequest().then(data=>{setTemp(data.main.temp);if(data.main.temp>=86){setWeather('hot');}else if(data.main.temp<=65){setWeather('cold');}else{setWeather('warm');}}).catch(err=>console.log(err));});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"card-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-section__heading",children:["Today is ",Math.round(temp),"\xB0F/ You may want to wear:"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"card-section__list",children:defaultClothingItems.filter(card=>card.weather===weather).map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ItemCard,{item:item.name,img:item.link,weather:item.weather},item._id))})]});}export default CardSection;
